channel.title: CVE Feed for Data Systems Consulting Co., Ltd. -- BPM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Data Systems Consulting Co., Ltd. -- BPM

item.title: CVE-2022-32458|2024-09-16T18:39:22.085Z -- data%20systems%20consulting%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- bpm
item.description: Digiwin BPM has a XML External Entity Injection (XXE) vulnerability due to insufficient validation for user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker can perform XML injection attack to access arbitrary system files.

item.title: CVE-2022-32456|2024-09-16T16:18:57.887Z -- data%20systems%20consulting%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- bpm
item.description: Digiwin BPMâ€™s function has insufficient validation for user input. An unauthenticated remote attacker can inject arbitrary SQL command to access, modify, delete database or disrupt service.

item.title: CVE-2022-32457|2024-09-16T22:35:56.260Z -- data%20systems%20consulting%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- bpm
item.description: Digiwin BPM has inadequate filtering for URL parameter. An unauthenticated remote attacker can perform Blind SSRF attack to discover internal network topology base on URL error response.
